title: Serviio FoxyTube
name: serviio-foxytube
description:
Serviio FoxyTube provides an easy way to obtain valid Youtube URL's for Serviio DLNA. It uses the latest Youtube v3 API.
You will be able to copy the URL from the clipboard by clicking the Serviio button, and after adding the URL into Serviio.
The Serviio button is visible on:
1) Videos tab of a channel
2) Playlist page.
Trust me, you'll love it
author: Sorin Burjan

preferences.name: serviioBaseURL
preferences.title: Serviio URL
preferences.description:
URL to Serviio DLNA Server, must also include the port number. Make sure that port is open on the server machine.
Example: http://localhost:23423
Example: http://192.168.0.2:23423
Example: http://mydomain.com:23423
